text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I am the Empress, Air Groove. I aim<n>to embody the ideals of
all<n>Umamusume and serve as a guiding<n>beacon for all.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
"Empress" is more than just a title to<n>Air Groove. It's an
aspiration.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't claim to fully understand what<n>that aspiration entails,
but I can tell<n>I've taken a step closer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Oh, okay! Thank you for sharing that.<n>I'll give it a try!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: You're right! Thank you, Air Groove!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I recall the satisfied looks on her<n>fellow students' faces, but
more<n>importantly, the gentle warmth that<n>radiated from her
own...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems that supporting her fellow<n>students is very
important to Air<n>Groove, both through her student<n>council
activities and her personal<n>mentoring.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: In that case...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Huh? My training regimen? You'll<n>look over it in place of Air
Groove?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Wow—thank you very much! Oh, so<n>about this part on
hamstring<n>exercises...

text_block_list.name: Student Council Member
text_block_list.text:
Man, these documents are really<n>giving me a headache.
Maybe I should<n>ask the vice prez about them...
choice_data_list: I can help you if you'd like.
I can help you if you'd like.

text_block_list.name: Student Council Member
text_block_list.text:
Oh, really? You'd be a lifesaver! I<n>wasn't sure how to tally
up the votes<n>here...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hey. Just what do you think you're<n>doing?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Don't play dumb. Do you think I<n>wouldn't notice that
you've been<n>snatching up my student council<n>tasks and
student appointments?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
What are you trying to say? That I<n>should just stay in my
lane and focus<n>on racing?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Well? Answer me! And if I don't like<n>what I hear, our
contract is over!
choice_data_list: I want to value the same things that you do.
I want to value the same things that you do.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: What?
choice_data_list: And I want to help you out, as your trainer.
And I want to help you out, as your trainer.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: To... help me?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I explain that I want her to let me help<n>with her various
activities, so that she<n>can devote more time to training<n>
without giving up on any of them.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Hmph. Me, rely on you? You could<n>stand to be a little more
dependable<n>before suggesting such a thing.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: However...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Our contract will remain effective. That<n>is all.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
A sturdy scepter to support my<n>weight as I walk my royal
path...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: So that is a trainer's role...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I continue to take on some of Air<n>Groove's tasks where I
can, and in<n>return she applies herself to her<n>training with
greater vigor than ever.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And at last, the day of the maiden<n>race that we have been
preparing for<n>arrives.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
After a beautiful start, she's pushed<n>all the way forward to
the front of the<n>pack—it's today's favorite, Air<n>Groove!
Can she shake off her debut<n>race loss?!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Ha!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's not slowing down! She's fast!<n>Air Groove widens
her lead! She's in<n>a league of her own!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
What a finish! Our winner comes in at<n>an overwhelming five
lengths ahead<n>of her competition!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The curtains are rising on the<n>legendary reign of the
Empress, Air<n>Groove!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day after her stunning victory, I<n>receive a text from Air
Groove letting<n>me know that she needs my help<n>with
something.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I grab my things in a rush and head<n>over.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
There you are. Wait... Why on earth<n>are you so out of
breath?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Well, whatever. The seeds I ordered<n>have finally arrived, so
let's get<n>started.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Flower seeds.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The seeds, it turns out, are destined<n>for the flower beds
behind the main<n>school building. We begin the task of<n>
planting them.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Hey, how many times do I have to tell<n>you?! You're
covering those seeds<n>with way too much soil!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Take your time and do each step<n>properly. These seeds are
way too<n>fragile for you to be rushing through<n>this.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After a few mishaps and a fair bit of<n>scolding, we just
about manage to<n>wrap up the planting before sundown.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
All right, that should do. I'm looking<n>forward to seeing them
bloom.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
What, are you trying to say that's<n>unexpected of me or
something? It's<n>written all over your face.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
When given the care and attention<n>that they need, the buds
emerge<n>strong and go on to bloom beautifully.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
The cycle repeats as new buds<n>grow—a testament to
perseverance<n>and aspiration.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
It was the sight of my own mother<n>running on the turf that
allowed me to<n>bloom into who I am.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
The winner of the G1 Japanese Oaks<n>inherits the title of
"Queen of the<n>Oaks."

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
My mother was able to rise above<n>the rest and ascend the
throne as a<n>queen.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
When I learned about that legendary<n>race and just how
hard she fought for<n>the title... I was shaken to my very<n>
core. The seeds of aspiration were<n>sown.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I dreamt of following in her<n>footsteps—of surpassing my
limits,<n>setting foot into the world of racing,<n>and claiming
victory.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
And more than anything, I knew I<n>wanted to continue the
cycle and<n>inspire others, just as she inspired<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
That's why I chose to embrace the<n>title of "Empress." I
wish to become<n>one who is looked upon by all<n>
Umamusume as an ideal to strive for.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
To be as one like my very own<n>mother—to bloom mightily
and<n>elegantly as a sign of hope for the<n>future.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
And for that, simply winning races<n>won't suffice. I need to
prepare the<n>soil of this academy well, so that the<n>seeds
that follow after me may grow<n>strong.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
If my trainers see no value in those<n>seeds, then I have no
need for a<n>trainer—or so I thought...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
But you... well. I suppose you may<n>have earned a little—just
a tiny bit,<n>mind you—of my t-trust...
choice_data_list: I have a green thumb, after all!
I have a green thumb, after all!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Oh, shut it! You've got to be the worst<n>gardener I've ever
met!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Geez, I was entirely too quick to bring<n>up this metaphor.
choice_data_list: Okay. I won't be "green" at this for long!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Knock it off with the tomfoolery!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite her harsh words, I get the<n>feeling her attitude
toward me has<n>changed, if only slightly.
